languages.text: {n}Задумчиво пожевав ваш запрос, старец припоминает, что номер принадлежит старшему трубоведу Орто. В последнюю вахту он с напарником обслуживал клапан 27-Б, снабжающий водой покои Вольного Торговца. По завершение обслуживания сдал вахту только его напарник.{/n}

{n}After mulling over your question for a while, the spirit recalls that the number is assigned to a senior pipewarden by the name of Orto. This Orto and his partner spent the last watch servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's chambers. After finishing up the maintenance, only Orto's partner reported in.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Задумчиво пожевав ваш запрос, старец припоминает, что номер принадлежит старшему трубоведу Орто. В последнюю вахту он с напарником обслуживал клапан 27-Б, снабжающий водой покои Вольного Торговца. По завершение обслуживания сдал вахту только его напарник.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After mulling over your question for a while, the spirit remembers that the number is assigned to a senior pipewarden by the name of Orto. This Orto and his parter spent the last watch servicing the valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's chambers. After finishing with the maintenance, only Orto's partner reported being relieved.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après avoir longuement réfléchi à votre question, l'esprit se souvient que ce matricule est celui d'un égoutier supérieur répondant au nom d'Orto. Son partenaire et lui-même ont passé le dernier quart à entretenir la valve 27-B, qui assure l'alimentation en eau des quartiers {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Une fois l'opération de maintenance terminée, seul son binôme est revenu faire son rapport.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After mulling over your question for a while, the spirit recalls that the number is assigned to a senior pipewarden by the name of Orto. This Orto and his partner spent the last watch servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's chambers. After finishing up the maintenance, only Orto's partner reported in.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir longuement réfléchi à votre question, l'esprit se souvient que ce matricule est celui d'un égoutier supérieur répondant au nom d'Orto. Son partenaire et lui-même ont passé le dernier quart à entretenir la valve 27-B, qui assure l'alimentation en eau des quartiers {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Une fois l'opération de maintenance terminée, seul son binôme est revenu faire son rapport.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras meditar tu pregunta durante un rato, el espíritu recuerda que el número está asignado a un inspector veterano de tuberías llamado Orto. Este Orto y su compañero se pasaron la última guardia trabajando en la válvula 27-B, que proporciona agua a las cámaras de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Tras completar el mantenimiento, solo el compañero de Orto lo registró.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After mulling over your question for a while, the spirit recalls that the number is assigned to a senior pipewarden by the name of Orto. This Orto and his partner spent the last watch servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's chambers. After finishing up the maintenance, only Orto's partner reported in.{/n}

Este Orto y su compañero se pasaron la última guardia trabajando en la válvula 27-B, que proporciona agua a las cámaras de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Tras completar el mantenimiento, solo el compañero de Orto lo registró.{/n}

languages.text: {n}机魂思考了一段时间之后，终于回忆起来，这个编号分配给了一个叫做奥托的高阶管道员。奥托和他的工友上一巡维护27-B号阀门，这个阀门负责给行商浪人的浴室供水，但维护结束之后，只有奥托的工友回去报到了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After mulling over your question for a while, the spirit recalls that the number is assigned to a senior pipewarden by the name of Orto. This Orto and his partner spent the last watch servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's chambers. After finishing up the maintenance, only Orto's partner reported in.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの質問を聞き、しばらく考え込んだ後、精霊はその番号がオルトという名の上級パイプ監視員に割り当てられていることを思い出した。オルトと彼の相棒は、最後の仕事として、ローグトレーダーの部屋に水を供給するバルブ27-Bの整備をしていた。整備を終えると、オルトの相棒のみ戻って来た。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After mulling over your question for a while, the spirit recalls that the number is assigned to a senior pipewarden by the name of Orto. This Orto and his partner spent the last watch servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's chambers. After finishing up the maintenance, only Orto's partner reported in.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの質問を聞き、しばらく考え込んだ後、精霊はその番号がオルトという名の上級パイプ監視員に割り当てられていることを思い出した。オルトと彼の相棒は、最後の仕事として、ローグトレーダーの部屋に水を供給するバルブ27-Bの整備をしていた。整備を終えると、オルトの相棒のみ戻って来た。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem der Geist eine Weile über deine Frage nachgedacht hat, erinnert er sich, dass die Zahl einem leitenden Rohrhüter namens Orto zugewiesen ist. Dieser Orto und sein Partner haben die letzte Wachtschicht damit zugebracht, Ventil 27-B zu warten, welches das Badegemach {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} mit Wasser versorgt. Nach Abschluss der Arbeiten hat nur Ortos Partner sich wieder zurückgemeldet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After mulling over your question for a while, the spirit recalls that the number is assigned to a senior pipewarden by the name of Orto. This Orto and his partner spent the last watch servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's chambers. After finishing up the maintenance, only Orto's partner reported in.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ruh, sorduğun soru üzerinde bir süre kafa patlatmasının ardından numaranın Orto ismindeki kıdemli bir hat muhafızına tayin edildiğini hatırlıyor. Bu Orto ile ortağı, son vardiyayı 27-B vanasının bakımını yaparak geçirmiş. Bu vana da Hür Tacir'in odasına giden suyu sağlıyor. Bakımı tamamlamalarının ardından yalnızca Orto'nun ortağı rapor vermiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After mulling over your question for a while, the spirit recalls that the number is assigned to a senior pipewarden by the name of Orto. This Orto and his partner spent the last watch servicing valve 27-B, which supplies water to the Rogue Trader's chambers. After finishing up the maintenance, only Orto's partner reported in.{/n}
